description: Rich, fudgy chocolate cookies filled with chocolate chunks. Perfect for chocolate lovers.
ingredients: [{"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "cup", "amount": "1/2"}, {"name": "brown sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": "1/2"}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": "1/4"}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "large egg", "units": null, "amount": "1"}, {"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cup", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "baking soda", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": "1/2"}, {"name": "cocoa powder", "units": "cup", "amount": "1/2"}, {"name": "whole milk", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "dark chocolate chunks", "units": "cup", "amount": "2/3"}, {"name": "extra chocolate for topping", "units": null, "amount": null}]
instructions: Step 01: Beat butter and sugars, then add vanilla and egg. Step 02: Sift in flour, baking soda, cocoa powder and salt. Step 03: Add milk if needed, stir in chocolate chunks. Step 04: Refrigerate dough for 30 minutes. Step 05: Form balls, bake at 350Â°F for 10-11 minutes. Step 06: Top with extra chocolate while warm.
notes: Chilling prevents spreading. Add milk only if needed.
